1.content:
You were sitting on your couch, watching TV and drinking a beer. Your girlfriend Amber is out shopping with some of her friends so you're sort of kicking back all by yourself. As you try to find something good to watch you hear a loud knock on your front door.

"Wonder who that could be?" You said and got up to get the door. When you open the door, nobody is there. Just a small brown box by your door. You pick it up and examine the box. There is no shipping address or label. Nothing at all. Just a blank box.

"Well I guess its mine now." You said and tear open the box. You then pull out what appears to be a strange looking pistol of some sort. It has two different buttons and an adjustable dial on it. Along with a safety switch.

"What the hell is this thing supposed to do?" You ask youself. You then search the box for any extra paperwork and find a small sheet with instructions on how to operate the device. You skim thru it and scratch your head.

"So, this thing can actually change somethings size? Someone was high when they wrote these instructions down..." You said and laughed. Then,
1.title: It begins

choices: You run into your neighbor, Jennifer
Instead, you go over to Sophies house
12.content:
You step outside of your house as you arent sure what to do with the package,

"oh well. I dont want this. This is obviously just some kids stupid toy that got sent to my house accidently. Since theres no return address anywhere I guess im gonna just go ahead and throw it away!" You said and start to head over to your trash can. Just as you approach the sidewalk,
12.title: Outside

121.content:
as you're about to drop the box and the toy into the recycling bin, you hear a car pull up in the driveway and see its your gf Amber who is back home from shopping! She is wearing a purple t-shirt, blue shorts and flip flops. You then wonder if Amber might know who this package belongs to and decide not to toss it just yet.

"Hey babe how'd the shopping go today?" you asked her, "Good as always hehehe......hey whats that in your hands?" Amber says.

"I dont know. Somebody left it at the doorstep and I have no idea who belongs to since it has no address on the box. you wouldnt happen to know who it would belong to would you?" You asked

"tch. no. lemme see it." Amber then takes it out of your hands and reads the instructions inside of the box.

"And you were going to throw this thing away?? This thing sounds kind of cool!" Amber tells you. She then sets the box aside and begins to adjust the dial a little.

"Oh come on you know it doesnt do what it says. Thats just not possible its a stupid toy." You tell her.

"Well theres nothing wrong with pretending right?" Amber says and smiles. little do you know once Amber squeezes that trigger, something bad is going to really happen for sure!
121.title: Amber shows up

1211.content: Does she actully grow herself or does thw gun only works when a guy holds it?
1211.title: Amber "pretends" to grow herself big

122.content:
You then bump into your hot neighbor, Jennifer who is just finishing up her usual evening jog. you've always secretly found her attractive and had a hard time hiding it from your gf Amber at times!

"Ooops. Oh hey Jennifer sorry about that. I need to watch where im going." You say.

"Oh thats ok Adin. what do you got in your hand there?" Jennifer asks.

"I dont know. Somebody sent me a package but there isnt any return address or nothing. Im just gonna throw it out since I have no use for it.......unless you want it???" You ask her. Jennifer thinks about it for a moment,

"Well, my nephew would probably like it since hes into those things. Let me see it real quick." Jennifer then takes the weird looking gun from you and examines it a bit.

"It also has some instructions...." Is all you're able to finish saying before,
122.title: Your neighbor jennifer

choices: 2 inches tall. Jennifer is able to spot you
2 centimeters tall. You're to small to be seen down here
1222.content:
"Whoa!!" Jennifer jumps back as a bright beam emits from the gun and zaps you! Jennifer did not mean to pull the trigger nor did she even think it'd actually fire anything since it was just a "toy".


"Oh my god! Adin?" Jennifer drops the gun and looks around in confusion and panic. Nobody was around to witness this and Jennifer was totally unsure what happened to you!

down on the ground, you are extremely confused. Straight ahead, you find yourself stairing at what seems to be jennifers massive nike running sneaker. You can smell all the dirt and sweat coming from the shoe. It then occurs to you that you have been shrank by that gun! You are now the size of,
1222.title: Jennifer accidently shrinks you!

choices: Jennifer trys to grow you back
12221.content:
You started jumping up and down, shouting out Jennifers name!

"Jennifer! Jennifer down here! Dont step on me!" You shouted out to her as loud as you could! Jennifer swears she could hear a tiny voice coming beneath her and happens to look down! She then spots her now tiny neighbor jumping up and down and banging on her right shoe!

"oh my god! Adin?!" Jenifer gasped in shocked! she then kneels down to see you better.

"oh thank god! Damn I guess that thing really does shrink people!" you said while observing your massive surroundings.

"I......i see..." Jennifer said, still a bit confused.

"Crap please unshrink me jennifer! Theres gotta be a way to reverse it on that gun!" You beg your towering neighbor. Jennifer then,
12221.title: Two inches tall

12222.content:
You try to call out to Jennifer but at this size you're just too small to be heard! Jennifer begins to freak out a little as she has no idea what just happened to you!

"Oh no oh no! What happened to him?! Did I make Adin disappear!?" Jennifer says in horror. She then looks around her surroundings, making sure nobody noticed.

"Alright alright calm down Jennifer......nobody was out here......nobody will know what happened." Jennifer says as she carefully places the gun in the pocket of her jogging shorts.

"Great. Now if the cops ever question her about my disappearance shes just going to cover this up like she knows nothing. I gotta do something quick!" You say. Jennifers giant sneaker creeps a few feet torwards you. Causing you to fall off your feet!

"Ahhhhh no!" You cried out! You have to do something now!
12222.title: Bug sized

choices: You follow Jennifer into the kitchen
122221.content:
You see Jennifers shoelace is hanging low enough for you to grab hold of. You quickly jumped up and wrapped your arms and legs around the tip of the shoelace as if you were climbing a tree. Jennifer then cautiosly makes her way back to her house. Still very nervous that somebody may have witnessed your little "accident". You hang on tight with each step Jennifer takes, praying that you wont be tossed off like a mad bull does to a rider! You're just lucky Jennifer isnt jogging anymore or else you'd surely wouldnt be able to hang on!

Jennifer walks into her house and slips off her shoes by the front door before heading into the kitchen. Almost immediately you are hit with the full powerful stink of Jennifers sweaty running shoes! You gag and drop down from the lace. You then get as far away as you can from those sneakers. Once you catch your breath you decide what your next move should be. Jennifer is in the kitchen doing something so you could try and find some other way to get closer to her. Making a decision..
122221.title: Going home with Jennifer

choices: Climb up the hanging power cord
1222211.content:
You ended up heading torwards the kitchen, where Jennifer is at. Jennifer is pulling out a pan and some stuff from the pantry and fridge to make some dinner. You notice a box and hamburger helper and a pack of ground beef on the counter.

"Of course. Thats Lisa's favorite." You say to yourself. You then take cover against the floor moldings as Jennifers thunderous foot steps near you. She then goes back to the stove and begins mixing the ingredients. You notice the unplugged power cord for the toaster hanging freely down the edge of the counter right next to you. Just low enough for you to grab onto and climb. You're just about to make your way torwards the cord when all of a sudden Jennifers huge foot slams down only a few feet from you! You jumped back, surprised at how close you've came to being crushed! You can smell the sweaty odor emitting from her nearby socked feet. Looking around, you see you're down to two choices. You could climb up the power cord as originally planned. Or you could take the more dangerous approach and pound on Jennifers toe and hope she feels you. Tho its highly possible you could be mistaken for a bug! What do you do?
1222211.title: Follow Jennifer

choices: Reaches down and picks you up ((You))
12222112.content:
Desperate, You decide to take the more dangerous approach and ran over to Jennifers foot, pounding and kicking her big toe! At the same time you try and hold your breath since you know Jennifer's feet stink. Jennifer feels something pinching her slightly and looks down.

"Jennifer! Jennifer down here! Help me!" You cry out, unsure if Jen can hear you.

"Oh my. Whats this?" Jennifer says looking down and spotting the tiny "Bug" by her foot. This is it. Will she see you as a human being, or just another mere bug in the house?
12222112.title: Noticed!

choices: Lisa recognizes you as her neighbor
1222212.content:
while moving as fast as you can to get away from jens horrible smelling sneakers you run straight into a huge pink object that smells similar to jens feet but nowhere near as strong. the smell is definitely of sweaty feet but a lighter scent and has a hint of perfume on them. kind of like what a teenage girl would wear to make herself smell nice.

you open your eyes and see that you ran straight into a gigantic pink sock clad foot. you follow the wiggling toes up to her ankles, to her knees,then bare midriff then breasts and then finally the face of the girl you were dreading on seeing. it was jennifers eighteen year old teenage daughter who was famous for being a huge rich snobby brat. she was wearing a pink collared shirt, dark blue jeans and pink fuzzy socks. she was normally nicer to you than other people and your other neighbor said Lisa might have a crush on you but you didnt believe her and brushed it off.

the worst part of this situation was that lisa mustve felt you collide into her big toe and was now looking right at the intruder to her house who just happened to be in her pathway. the only question is will she help you or take advantage of your shrunken size.....probably the latter.
1222212.title: Her 18 year old Daughter shows up

choices: Head over to Lisa's back pack
Run into Lisa's overturned converse sneaker
12222121.content:
Lisa then raises her foot over you and prepares to crush you!

"Eat foot bug!" Lisa says and begins to bring her foot down on you!

"Noooo pleeease!!" You cry out and run out of the way just seconds before her massive pink socked foot slammed down on the ground you stood on. You are thrown off your feet and onto the ground due to the violent impact at your size! You quickly recover onto your feet only to see the shadow of Lisa's foot looming over you once again!

"Lisa no its me Aden! Please dont crush me!" You cry out and dove out of the oncoming foots path once more. The sound of Lisa's giant foot hitting the ground is almost deafening at your size!

Lisa laughs as the "bug" continues to evade its fate.

"You sure are intelligent and fast for a bug." Lisa says as she temporarily lost site of you. Not having anything better to do, Lisa continues hunting you down! Seeing the goddess has lost track of you, you try to find the nearest place to hide to avoid being spotted again. You,
12222121.title: Stomping time!

122222.content:
The shoe is heading torwards you too fast! You fall on your back and scream as the massive sole of her sneaker blocks out the sun and comes down on you with a small sickening squish....

Seeing you are nowhere in site, jennifer turns around and heads back to her house. Your bloody remains now lodged between the tread of Jennifers running shoe! Jennifer also tosses the weapon in the trash to get rid of the evidence. Eventually your remains dry up and harden overnight. It takes about three jogs before your body is finally dislodged from her shoe, after jennifer steps thru a small mud puddle while going for a morning jog. Nobody will ever know that you were crushed beneath this womans smelly sneaker..
122222.title: Crushed by Jennifer

choices: Margaret smiles evily and shrinks you
Margaret pulls the trigger and grows herself
Margaret invites you into her home first
123.content:
you look over your shoulder for some reason, then as you turn your head back you find yourself almost nose to nose with your neighbor Margaret! You notice she is wearing a white decal t-shirt, blue jeans and tennis shoes.

"Oh! Sorry Margaret. You sort of popped up out of nowhere!" You said.

"Oh hey Adin. I was just going to check my mail.....What is that you are holding??" Margaret asks.

"Garbage heh." Is all you tell her.

"No no let me see that. It looks interesting!" She says. You nod and hand it over to Margaret.

"It also has some instructions here. Obviously they know how to really tap into a childs imagination these days eh?" You said. Margaret smiles and reads the instructions on how to operate the device.

"So........this can change the size of a person?" Margaret says,

"Supposedly. You dont really believe all that right?" You said to her with a funny smile.

"Well lets just find out." Margaret says before
123.title: Curious Margaret

choices: Margaret raises her foot over you
1231.content:
"What are you doing?" You say as Margaret points the gun at you.

"I sure really hope this works." She says and pulls the trigger.

"Dont be redicu-AGH!!" You are then cut off as you are hit with a bright green beam and begin to diminish in size! Margaret watches in awe as you are reduced down to half an inch in height!

"Holy shit! What the hell just happened?!" You said as you find yourself facing a giant pair of dirty white tennis shoes. They are the converse sneakers with the smiley toe cap on them ((As a bonus here is a pic of Adin lying before Margarets shoes)) http://img443.imageshack.us/img443/344/b...

"Oh dear god! What happened to me!?" You cry out! Margaret bursts out into laughter at your puny form!

"You are so small and insignificant now!" Margaret says and then,
1231.title: Shrunk by Margaret

12313.content:
"Maybe i'll step on you now aden just for being such a horrible neighbor hahahaha!" Margaret laughs very evily! Then, you heard another enormous but familiar voice come from behind margaret. "Margaret what are you laughing at?" Your girlfriend amber says as she approaches Margaret. Margaret turns around and faces amber,

"Im laughing because now you to are going to experience a life being small like your boyfriend." Margaret said and whacked Amber over to head, knocking her to the ground! "That was for the facebook comment about me being single because im strange." Margaret says standing over Amber. "Eeeik! You bitch! Whats wrong with you?!" Amber says before she finds herself looking at the shrink gun. "What is that?!?" Amber exlaims,

"Soon you will find out........" Margaret then pulls the trigger and zaps poor amber to half an inch tall just like you are. Margaret claps her hands together and squeals in excitement! "Now I have two tiny people!" Margaret says before reaching down and grabbing the two of you.


"We're going to have a lot of fun today....." Margaret said to the two screaming terrified people in her hand. Margaret walks into her house and heads into,
12313.title: Two shrunken people are better than one!

choices: Margaret shrinks herself back to normal.
1232.content:
Margaret adjusts the dial and points the gun at herself.

"Wait what are you doing Margaret? You dont even know what that thing really does!" You tell her! Just then a bright beam is fired off and strikes Margaret in the chest. She gasps as she then feels her body starting to expand!

"Look adin it really does work!" Margaret exclaims as she continues to grow. You step back away from Margaret and watch helplessly as she stops at an astonishing 500 feet tall. Margaret looks around in awe as she can see everything from up here! She then looks back down at you, still standing in the middle of the street and in just as much awe to.

"Neat...." Is all Margaret says.

"Is it. But I think you outta shrink yourself back to normal size now before you draw too much attention." You tell Margaret since she still has the gun in her hand unfortunatly. What happens now?
1232.title: Margaret becomes a giantess

choices: Margaret moves further down the residential area!
Margaret turns her attention back to you!
12322.content:
"Sorry Adin, but I like being bigger than everyone else and now im going to show this neighborhood whos in charge!" Margaret says placing her hands on her hips. All the people in the neighborhood saw the huge young woman and began to panic! Margaret lifts her foot over three little people and crushes them flat beneath her shoe! You watch in horror and disgust as Margaret twists her foot, grinding all the guts and bones into the pavement. You step back as the huge puddle of blood nearly comes in contact with your shoes.

"Thats right! Run from your new goddess if you dare you puny people!" Margaret says and laughs! She then started to stomp down the street. Margarets foot alone was so big that it can crush an entire house completely in one step! And all you can do is watch house after house being flattened to nothing beneath Margarets huge shoe. You could only imagine all the poor familys inside that were crushed alive in their own homes all because they didnt get the chance to escape!

"Hehehe! Thanks Adin. I wouldnt be having this much fun if it werent for you!" Margaret says as she blows you a kiss. The streets are in much more chaos now. Some people try to escape in their cars, driving around Margarets giant foot. Margaret spots a car and quickly brings her foot down on it.

"Gotcha hehe!" Margaret says as she flattens the car into nothing. She then spots two more cars and proceeds to do the same thing. Stomping them as if they were annoying little cockroaches. Margaret then reaches down and picks up a minivan full of people. She brings to van up to her face and smiles at the terrified passengers inside! Margaret then runs her massive wet tongue across the hhood and windshield of the van, terrifying the people inside even more! Margaret laughs before placing it into her palm and closing her hand, crushing the van into a mess of twisted metal and guts. Blood and oil ooze a little from Margarets fingers before she releases the heap of metal and it crashes to the ground!

"Ouch kind of burnt my hand a little hehe!" Margaret said and looked for any more vehicles to crush. She then spots a high powered motorcycle trying to escape. It was faster than a car but still not fast enough to outrun the giantess Margaret! Margaret simply bends down and picks the rider right off of his seat! The driverless bike ends up crashing into an overturned car in the road! The helpless man is lifted high off the ground and brought up to margarets face. She then opens her mouth and places the terrified man inside! Margarets mouth then closes and her jaw begins to move up and down, her jagged sharp teeth ripping the doomed man to shreds!

"Mmm yummy." Margaret says.

"Argh this is horrible!!" You say to yourself while witnessing all this carnage! You know that this is all your fault but there is nothing you can do anymore since Margaret has the gun. Just when it couldnt get any worse,
12322.title: The neighborhoods in trouble!

123222.content:
Not being able to stand all this violence caused by the girl who was just a good neighbor for the past three years, you turn around and head back to your house! You just need to get your car so you can drive the hell out of here. Margaret seems to be enjoying herself too much to even notice you. At least, thats what you thought....

Suddenly Margarets huge fist slams down, blocking your path!

"Going somewhere Adin?" She says and picks you up in her hand and lifts you to her face.

"Margaret! No! Please! I'll do anything for you! I'll be your slave! I'll do anything you wish as long as you dont hurt me!" You begged her! Margaret then thinks for a moment. She was originally just going to torture you a bit before probably killing you like she'd do to any other tiny person. But the thought of having her own tiny neighbor willingly offer to become her slave was just a little too much to pass up. Plus it would only be fare since without Adin, She surely would not be enjoying this wonderful moment!

"Sounds good Adin. You can be my slave. Especially after all the things ive heard you say about me behind my back. Your job will be very dirty and not easy...." Margaret says before she has you,
123222.title: Margarets new slave

choices: Margaret has you do another task
1232221.content:
"Ive been on my feet all day today Adin and they are very tired. And you thought you could get away with saying shit about me these past three years to? You deserve this punishment." Margaret then unlaces her shoes and kicks them both off. The shoes crash to the ground, destroying several houses and crushing innocent people. Next she then pulls off her socks and carelessly drops them to the ground,covering many homes and people! You choke and gag immediatly on the smell coming from Margarets bare feet.

Margaret then sits down on the ground, crushing a few innocent people beneath her giant ass as well!

"Massage and kiss my feet!" Margaret commands. You quickly get to work and rub the massive feet. You feel sick to your stomach from the smell. The whole entire neighborhood now smells like feet since margaret removed her shoes! You also felt extremely humiliated to as many fleeing people looked over and noticed you rubbing the giantesses feet!

"Lick them with your tongue now." Margaret says. You nod and begin to lick her titanic soles. The sour taste is terrible and nearly makes you hurl.

"Mmmmmmmm......." Margaret moans. Many minutes pass and all you can think about is finishing this terrible torturement! Just then,
1232221.title: Worship her feet

13.content:
As you fidgeted with the gun a bit more, you accidently pressed a button causing the tip of the barrel to glow! Your eyes widen in terror and before you can do anything, a strong light engulfs your body and you black out!


a short time later, you awake on the floor of your hallway. You rub your eyes and immediatly realize something isnt quite right. This is still your house but everything is enourmous now! You are now only?
13.title: You "Shrink" yourself

Sophie, checking to see if things are ok

little do you know is that you've just been reduced to the size of a bug. you can see all the crumbs and dirt on the floor all around you. and worst of all you spot the gun laying a few hundred feet from you at your now miniscule size!

"Shit this isnt good." You say to yourself. Suddenly you hear the door knob turning on the front door. You spin around and realize somebody is coming inside of the house. You quickly run behind the leg of a nearby table and take cover! Looking out from the corner, the door slowly opens and you see
132.title: Half inch tall

Its your girlfriend Amber back from shopping! But will she see you? Amber slips off her flip flops and grabs two shopping bags full of various things shes bought from the mall. You arent sure what to do as your now giantess girlfriend stomps right past you and down the hall. She then stops about half way to check a text message she recieved on her cellphone.

"I gotta do something. I cant stay like this forever! If I can just get her attention then I can have Amber unshrink me with the gun!" You said to yourself. You then run out from your hiding spot and torwards your girlfriend and
1321.title: Amber the giantess

Amber spotted something just laying on the floor and reached down to pick it up,

"Oh no!" You said to yourself as Amber begins to play around with the gun.

"Hmmm what an interesting looking toy. I wonder how this got in here? I think Adin is a little too old to be playing with these haha!" Amber laughs. You begin to shout out to her as loud as you can,

13212.title: Amber found the gun

"oh my god what just happened to me?!" amber cried out as she looked at herself and her surroundings. you are only a mere few feet from amber as you look down and shake your head in disbelief. "well, looks like im not the only one who got turned into an ant today" you say sarcastically. amber turns around and sees you! "adin! oh god what happened! please tell me this is a terrible dream!" amber says in her terrified voice.

"no its not. and now unless somebody else can use that gun to reverse our size, we are going to be stuck like this for awhile. but hey look on the bright side. we are in the safety of our own house. we dont have to worry about being stepped on by somebody outside right?" you try to assure amber until you both hear the front doorknob turning! uhoh, it looks like you got an unexpected visitor and its,
132121.title: Amber shrunk herself

you and amber try to get margarets attention

"anybody home??" she asks one more time. you know margaret is your neighbor and you'd normally trust her. but at you and ambers size now, she could quite possibly be your enemy now. however, thats just a chance you are going to have to take. you and amber decide to get margarets attention before she leaves by
1321212.title: margaret the concerned neighbor

"Well geeze I don't know! We're just going to have to figure out some other way to attract her attention." You said and tried to think of something within the few precious seconds you and amber only have.

Margaret gently knocks and peaks thru the unlocked front door,

"Hello? Adin? Amber? Im returning your cake bowl........." Margaret notices no one is home and walks inside. You gasp in shock at how huge she is now! You arent really too happy she just walked into your own house either. Amber told Margaret that if nobody was home and the door was unlocked she was welcome to come inside. Even tho you trust Margaret and shes more of a friend than a neighbor, Margaret tends to be a little nosey at times and you were afraid she might go thru some of your......"personal" items and tell Amber!. Margaret notices your floor tiles look clean and her shoes are dirty. Not wanting to be rude, Margaret slips her feet out of her black flats and walks past you and over to the kitchen. You were nearly thrown off your feet due to the monstrous foot steps that shook the floor beneath you!

"Christ! I should try and do something..." You then decide what you want to do next

13222.title: Approach Margarets shoes

132222.content:
you fell inside of margarets shoe! as you stand up, the stink is so unbearable and you try not to hurl your guts out! you pretty much are screwed and have no way of getting out. you look ahead and can see the toe imprints that margarets feet molded inside the shoe. you are even more digusted. you always found margaret cute but now finding yourself trapped inside of her own shoe is just nasty! suddenly, margaret heads back to her shoes and prepares to insert her feet back inside of them!
"oh god!" is all you say before you
132222.title: in margarets flat

You run quickly to the toe area of the shoe just as Margaret's bare toes are coming down. You have a second to catch your breath before the foot enters.

1322221.title: run to the toe area

1322222.content:
you stay in the arch area and lay down on your back, hoping that the arch from margarets foot will provide you some space from being crushed. this plan might of worked for someone else. unfortunately, you didnt know margaret has rather flat feet. you learn that the hard way when margaret inserts her foot inside her black flat, pinning you between the fleshy wall of her foot and the sole of her shoe. if margaret even felt anything, it was too insignificant to even bother removing her shoe again. margaret slammed her foot down on the floor as she took her first step out of your house. crushing your entire body like a car crusher at a junk yard. the next day amber looks for you but you're nowhere to be found. a few weeks later amber is at margarets house and begins to cry.
"its ok amber. i have faith and believe aden is ok..." margaret says trying to comfort amber while she dangles her flat. nobody will ever find your ant sized body which is now buried under a blanket of sweat and grime inside margarets flat. she continues to wear them for another year before they are worn out and thrown away in the trash.
1322222.title: squished

1323.content:
As the door opens, you see your neighbor Sophie entering the room. You couldn't believe the horrible timing of it all. Sophie was known for her deep hatred of bugs, and right now you were so small that she could easily mistake you for one! Knowing that Sophie would likely try to crush you if she saw you at this size, you immediately try to run. Just then, Sophie's voice echoes across the room.

"Adin, are you okay? I'm coming in to check on you, alright..."

As Sophie steps inside, her eyes proceed scan the floor. Knowing that you would be easier to notice while moving, you decide to freeze in place and hope that she doesn't see you.


What happens next?
1323.title: A bad time to be a bug!

info.brief_description: People begin to grow or shrink in a neighborhood with disastrous results!
info.description:
You are a 27 year old guy named Adin. You have brown hair, brown eyes and an athletic build. You live with your girlfriend, Amber, who is 22. Your life is decent until one Sunday afternoon you find a blank package at your doorstep containing a gun that can alter the size of any living being. What will happen now???



Main Giantess characters ((You can add your own characters later on. pictures optional))

((Due to numerous requests, I have refreshed the character portraits!))


1. Amber Larson - http://www.use.com/JWOIA

Age: 22
Height: 5'7"
Weight: 143lbs
More Info: Your girlfriend. You've been together with her for almost three years now. Shes probably the only person you'd ever trust in your life.
